text: What are you doing at 11pm tonight? Nothing? Perfect - my Comedy Central stand-up show is back. What's that? Something just came up? Hello?

column4: yes - which meant I had to sing the end credit music myself. I think I might have broken The Daily Show.

column4: you have to agree on this - he had a commitment to the beret.

text: Donald Trump should be the next Pope. The Catholic Church is the only organization that likes gold more than he does.

column4: the White House will be one of the smallest houses he's ever lived in.

The RNC 2012 will be remembered for so many things...as long every single one of those things are Clint Eastwood or chair related.
Farewell to the RNC. Somehow fitting that it was held in Tampa - a physical and emotional swamp.
